name: Mitigation Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Exploit
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker exploited a command interpreter vulnerability to execute shell scripts for data exfiltration.

action--b1a3c5f5-b8d9-4b45-9c9e-4ae6d7e4.name: Kill malicious process
action--b1a3c5f5-b8d9-4b45-9c9e-4ae6d7e4.description: Terminate the suspicious script running on the server.

action--5218c4db-9fa3-4a59-a8da-0c0fc5a3.name: Block outbound traffic to malicious IP
action--5218c4db-9fa3-4a59-a8da-0c0fc5a3.description: Prevent any further attempts to exfiltrate data by blocking the malicious IP.

while-condition--e2b3c154-5a2a-4b30-a901.name: Security scan loop
while-condition--e2b3c154-5a2a-4b30-a901.description: Repeatedly run security scans until no vulnerabilities are found.

action--9d3f578e-1f28-4b1f-9a35-3c1f7d8e.name: Run security scan
action--9d3f578e-1f28-4b1f-9a35-3c1f7d8e.description: Execute a security scan on the target domain to look for vulnerabilities.

scan_found_vulnerabilities.description: Indicates if vulnerabilities are found in the scan
